title: choose fonts and provide advice on layout for my website
content: I'm thinking about getting an expert's opinion on fonts that will work for my existing website. The site is a business tool with a subdued, late-1800s motif. This would not be an extended project, just an hour or so of your time. A video Skype call might work best. Please reply, however you like, with your rate if you're interested.
author: stinkyfoot
